title: Governance Actions
description: Register or update your status as a Bitshares Witness or Committee Member.
witnessDescription: Manage your witness registration. Witnesses produce blocks and maintain the network.
alreadyRegisteredWitness: You are already registered as witness: {witnessId}
urlInfo: A URL linking to more information about you or your witness proposal.
signingKeyInfo: The public key your witness node will use to sign blocks.
notCurrentlyWitness: You are not currently registered as a witness.
newUrlInfo: Enter a new URL if you wish to update it.
newSigningKeyInfo: Enter a new block signing key if you wish to update it.
committeeDescription: Manage your committee membership. Committee members manage blockchain parameters.
alreadyRegisteredCommittee: You are already registered as a committee member: {committeeId}
notCurrentlyCommittee: You are not currently registered as a committee member.
